<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Smogger](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1592)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn backpack

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Some mutants savor the acrid smog of Alkenstar and the Gunworks. A _smogger_ recreates this pollution by sucking in clean air and spewing it back out as pungent smog.

<document level="2" id="action-1204" />

<document level="2" id="action-1205" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Smogger
